metadata.title: CVE-2021-3611 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: components for: CVE-2021-3611 QEMU: intel-hda: segmentation fault due to stack overflow

notes.note: mdeslaur> introduced in 5.0.0-rc0 by: https://git.qemu.org/?p=qemu.git;a=commit;h=a9d8ba2be58e067bdfbff830eb9ff438d8db7f10  as of 2022-01-05, there is no fix available from upstream

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
